comment: The derangements formula, which expresses the number of derangements of a finite nonempty set in terms of the factorial. The expression ` |_ `` ( x + 1 / 2 ) ` is a way of saying "rounded to the nearest integer". This is part of Metamath 100 proof #88. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jan-2015.)
